text_favorites_destinations: Find here the best destinations for your next trip in France !
text_Paris: Visit Paris, the city of love and lighs, and their historical monuments.
text_Marseille: Discover the Phocaean city and its coves.
text_Annecy: Enjoy Lake Annecy and its mountains.
text_Bordeaux: Taste Bordeaux wines and visit the city.
text_Strasbourg: Discover the Alsatian villages and their charms.
text_favorites_activities: Find here the best activities to do in France !
